name: You lame dog!
description:
THIS IS CURRENTLY UNFINISHED AND UNDER DEVELOPMENT

Your main goal is to collect food for your annoying (and lame) dog.

Current Features:

- Open world map

- Continuous story missions

- All current and future buildings are/will be enterable (with the exception of the police station and grocery store)

- Drivable Cars

- Main menu & Pause Menu

THIS IS CURRENTLY UNFINISHED AND UNDER DEVELOPMENT

Future plans

- More story missions

- Voice acting

- More car variations

- More buildings

- Map changes (e.g. water, hills etc.)

- Easter eggs

and more
